title: Mark F. Meier Memorial Fund for INSTAAR
description: To provide support for INSTAAR at the University of Colorado Boulder in memory of former Director Mark F. Meier with the goal of naming a room in his honor at SEEC.
marketingContent: To provide support for INSTAAR at the University of Colorado Boulder in memory of former Director Mark F. Meier with the goal of naming a room in his honor at SEEC.
